relproducts.title: Carnival 15 Ochre Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Carnival roller blinds are great for kitchens, bathrooms or offices. A versatile fabric, carnival 15 fabrics are moisture-resistant, flame-retardant and anti-allergen coated, and is available in several fabulous, saturated colours. This sunshine yellow electric roller adds a bright splash of colour to your window, evoking feelings of positivity and warm summer days. At swiftdirectblinds, quality is important to us, so not only does this roller blind made by their expert team and comes with customer-first service, we also provide a five-year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
